Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Belden
ShortDescription: Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand and Austin due to street blockage near Austin/Belden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand and Austin.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Austin/Belden.
